name: Systems Risk Consultants (e-Ventrisk)
overview:
Welcome to e-Ventrisk Systems Risk Consultants! e-Ventrisk is a provider of consultancy and educational services in the fields of Compliance, financial security, Risk and Governance. Our primary customers are the financial institutions.

e-Ventrisk mission is to protect our customers from falling victim to risk and reputational incidents. In order to accomplish our mission, our competent and experienced consultants shall facilitate and guide you towards establishing a combination of appropriate Governance, Control and Risk mitigation strategies. With e-Ventrisk guidance you will be able to mitigate the risk vulnerabilities in your business and control processes that are inadequate to overcome the internal weaknesses and external threats. E-Ventrisk professionals provide you solutions to your vexing problems from a global perspective that combine in-depth local knowledge and decades of experience to ensure that your Governance, Risk and or Control framework are all well aligned to each other and documented.

e-Ventrisk shall help you implement a Program of activity and controls in order to achieve your organizational objectives.

Based on e-Ventrisk recommendations, you will be in a better position to take decisions as to the end - to - end processes in the deployment of Technology, Tools & applications that are most aligned - albeit with due consideration for cost effectiveness - with your own organizational directions.
